dcterms:creator: N. Kumar
R. Verma
S. Sharma
S. Bhargava
A. Vahadane
A. Sethi
dcterms:description: This dataset from MICCAI 2018 contains 37 training images at 1000 × 1000 pixels resolution, obtained at 40× magnification, as well as 14 testing images. Dense annotations of all nuclei in all images are provided.
dcterms:title: MoNuSeg

dcterms:creator: S. Graham
Q. D. Vu
S. E. A. Raza
A. Azam
Y. W. Tsang
J. T. Kwak
N. Rajpoot
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 27 training images at 1000 × 1000 pixels resolution, obtained at 40× magnification, as well as 14 similar testing images. There are dense annotations of all nuclei in all images.
dcterms:title: CoNSeP

dcterms:creator: P. Naylor
M. Laé
F. Reyal
T. Walter
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of 50 images at 512×512 pixels, along with dense annotations of all nuclei. It is split into a training set of 28 images and a testing set with the remaining 22 images.
dcterms:title: TNBC
